mapper.select: select bannerTitle, bannerSubTitle, bannerImg from banner where pageName = #{param1} order by bannerNum
select cateCode, cateName, cateImg from category order by cateRank
select cateCode, cateName, proCode, proName, proImg, comName, proGoal, proNow, proEnd, likeCount from project where proCheck = 'Y' and cateName NOT IN('기부/후원') order by proOpen

select cateCode, cateName, proCode, proName, proImg, comName, proGoal, proNow, proEnd, likeCount from project where proCheck = 'Y' and proOpen > sysdate and proEnd > sysdate and cateName NOT IN('기부/후원') order by proOk

select cateCode, cateName, proCode, proName, proImg, comName, proGoal, proNow, proEnd, likeCount from project where proCheck = 'Y' and proOpen < sysdate and proEnd > sysdate and cateName = '기부/후원' order by proOpen
select cateCode, cateName, proCode, proName, proImg, comName, proGoal, proNow, proEnd, likeCount from project where proCheck = 'Y' and cateName = #{cateName} order by proOpen
mapper.insert: insert into banner (bannerNum, bannerTitle, bannerSubTitle, bannerImg, pageName) values(bannerSq.nextVal, #{bannerTitle}, #{bannerSubTitle}, #{bannerImg}, #{pageName})
